Pour syrup into silver julep cup, silver mug, or Collins glass.  Fill with shaved or crushed ice and add bourbon.  Stir until glass is heavily frosted, adding more ice if necessary.  Garnish with mint so that the tops are about 2 inches above rim of glass.  Use short straws so that it will be necessary to bury nose in mint, which is intended for scent rather than taste.
